dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: LibriLight is a benchmark for ASR with limited or no supervision, designed to evaluate the performance of ASR systems under conditions of limited labeled data.
dcterms:title: LibriLight
